summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2324, for the improvement of Maple Leaf Place, from 5th Avenue Northeast to 6th Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 24034 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
